popular, but in Kenya
beekeepers are increasingly turning to
another product, which is bee venom.
This is a substance that is increasingly used
in
medicine to extract bee venom. Beekeepers use
a device when  Turning it on will make the bee
uncomfortable and fly to Sting it. Then they
will remove the glass underneath and scrape it.
Normally, when you finish stinging the bee,
it will die, but this tool can
collect the venom and the bee will still be alive.  Not
every species of bee is suitable for extracting venom, but it must
be as aggressive as possible. On the
other hand, each bee only has a few Mg to filter poison,
so it may take three bee colonies to
collect enough venom at a time.  The
collection time lasts from 30 to 45 minutes depending
on the species of bee and the time of day.
However, bee venom can be harvested within a day,
while beekeeping for sugar can
take up to 4 months. However, the value of
bee venom is  quite high in millet, each bee venom
orange can be sold for how many
US dollars while in the international market it
can be up to 100 dollars. The high demand for
this item has helped beekeepers
ensure their lives.
